title: Set Fire to the Rain
summary: "Set Fire to the Rain" is a song recorded by English singer-songwriter Adele for her second studio album, 21. The song was Adele's third consecutive US number-one single from 21 and reached the top ten in most of other foreign markets.  The song was voted by readers of Billboard as their favorite number one hit of 2012.[1] The song's live rendition from the DVD Live at the Royal Albert Hall won the Grammy Award for Best Pop Solo Performance at the 55th Annual Grammy Awards.[2]
